title: I need this cool font please help!
content:
Hi everyone,

just wondering if anyone knew what this font is, I’ve been searching for it for a while.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rogueSatelliteFont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423084307/http:/typophile.com/files/rogueSatelliteFont.jpg) | 11.1 KB |

 [‹ Aaargh... brain freeze today](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423084307/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43749 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sprinkles Cupcake Script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423084307/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43748 "Go to next forum topic")
author: viceversarohan

comments.content:
It was a good idea to bump this back up in the list, but I think the problem (especially for me) is two-fold:  
1) the lettering is small;  
2) it’s some darn Techno font

Number 2 is a problem for me because so many of the things look like each other and so many of the fonts being used are amateur designs. If none of us recognized this as a commercial font, then your best bet would be to type this phrase into the sample window at [Dafont’s SciFi category](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423084307/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303) and see if a match shows up. I’m amazed at how often this works on this style of font.

- Mike Yanega

Hi Mike,

thanks for the response, I’ll give Dafont a go.
